pv40:1.3: Taṁ dāni me na → taṁ dāni ve (bj); taṁ dāni me (pts-vp-pli1-2); na dāni me taṁ (mr) | paribhogameti → paribhogaṁ na upeti (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); paribhogaṁ upeti (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv40:2.1: Haññāmi → vihaññāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | vāyamāmi → vāyamāmi ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv40:8.1: gantvāna piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsi → iṅgha tuvaṁ piṭṭhito gaṇha ucchuṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2)
